lead_paragraph: Think registering your business sounds like a perfunctory and insignificant task? Think again.
snippet: Think registering your business sounds like a perfunctory and insignificant task? Think again. The registration process forces you to confront a battery of questions that should be part of the bedrock of your business plan.
abstract: Think registering your business sounds like a perfunctory and insignificant task? Think again. The registration process forces you to confront a battery of questions that should be part of the bedrock of your business plan.
